## Installing WRTDStidal

### Option 1

From the R Console prompt, run the following commands to install and load the development version from GitHub. 

```{r eval = FALSE}
install.packages('devtools')
library(devtools)
install_github('fawda123/WRTDStidal')
library(WRTDStidal)
```

### Option 2

1) Download the source file: [v1.0.1.9000.tar.gz](https://github.com/fawda123/WRTDStidal/archive/v1.0.1.9000.tar.gz)

2) Install the file using the full file path

```{r eval = F}
# change as needed
path_to_file <- 'C:/Users/mbeck/Desktop/WRTDStidal-1.0.1.9000.tar.gz'

# install, load
install.packages(path_to_file, repos = NULL, type="source")
library(WRTDStidal)
```
